title:
Regularity of the (N-1)-particle electronic reduced density matrix for
  molecules with fixed nuclei and N electrons
abstract:
We consider an electronic bound state of the usual, non-relativistic,
molecular Hamiltonian with Coulomb interactions, fixed nuclei, and N electrons
(N>1). Near appropriate electronic collisions, we determine the regularity of
the (N-1)-particle electronic reduced density matrix.
